LanguageData.Yokai_JorouGumo.label: JorouGumo
LanguageData.Yokai_JorouGumo.description: Often found in humid climes, the Jorou Gumo is a picky huntress. This spider yokai only cares to eat the raw meat of her foes; however, her claws and bites make quick work of her prey. Colonists that choose to keep her company will be graced with a daily supply of yarn. As a friend, her gentle face may disarm you; but, always be aware of untamed Jorou Gumo near your colony: to them, colonists are easy prey.
LanguageData.Yokai_JorouGumo.tools.0.label: Stab
